name: pretest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a test that is done on a product, piece of equipment, etc. to make sure it works before it is sold or used: The company was advised to carry out pretests on all electrical goods.
to do a test on a product, piece of equipment, etc. to make sure it works before it is sold or used: We pretested all the equipment before it was installed in the office. Before a questionnaire is finalized, it is always a good idea to get it pretested.
